scripts.db:dev: sequelize-cli db:drop && sequelize-cli db:create && sequelize-cli db:migrate && sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.db:test: sequelize-cli db:drop --env test && sequelize-cli db:create --env test && sequelize-cli db:migrate --env test
scripts.seed:test: sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all --env test && sequelize-cli db:seed:all --env test
scripts.seed:prod: sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all --env production && sequelize-cli db:seed:all --env production
